If the game just exit do desktop when you try to start it, it's because of your refresh rate. It's the exact same problem that BF1942 had... Quote: "- Battlefield 1942 has that annoying refresh rate crap where every time you patch it you have to go into the config file and change the "allow all refresh rates" from 0 to 1 so the game works if you use a refresh rate other than 60 Hz." Where "patch" = fresh install in this case Anyways you find the config file in modsbf2settings and it's called VideoDefault.con (just open with notepad) and the line is renderer.allowAllRefreshRates If there's a Video.con file in that folder too you might wanna copy the line into that config and set it to 1 as well.

Just in case anyone encounters this problem...
